document_data.name: Hoar's Revenance
document_data.mainbody: '''''Revenance''''' was a powerful [[Divine magic|divine]] [[necromancy]] [[spell]] used by specialty priests devoted to [[Hoar]] called [[Doombringer]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell caused a corpse to rise as a [[revenant]] and seek out its killer for vengeance. This spell would only work if the killer was still alive. The caster did not have control over the risen revenant, but would only be attacked if they hindered the revenant from finding their killer. The revenant would track its target for up to six months before disintegrating.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s a token important to the deceased target and the priest's [[holy symbol]] to cast.
